DOC.brief_summary: This phase l study examine Absorption , Distribution , Metabolism Excretion TKI258 . There 2 cohort . Cohort 1 ( 4 patient ) receive single radio-labeled 500mg dose TKI258 follow 15 day daily dose 400mg TKI258 . Cohort 2 ( 9 patient ) receive 400mg TKI258 .
DOC.brief_title: Absorption , Distribution , Metabolism Excretion ( ADME ) Study TKI258 Patients With Advanced Solid Malignancies
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Aged ≥ 18 year 2 . Patients histologically confirm solid tumor lymphoma resistant/refractory approve therapy appropriate therapy available . 3. WHO performance status ≤ 2 4 . All previous treatment ( include surgery radiotherapy ) must complete least four week prior study entry acute toxicity must resolve 5 . Written inform consent participate study Exclusion criterion : 1 . Primary Brain Tumors symptomatic leptomeningeal metastases 2 . Clinically significant cardiac impairment unstable ischemic heart disease include myocardial infarction within six month study start 3 . Fertile male willing use contraception whose female partner use adequate contraceptive protection Pregnant lactate woman ( woman childbearing potential must negative pregnancy test ( > 5 mIU/ml ) inclusion study ; postmenopausal woman must amenorrheic least 12 month ) . Female patient must use adequate contraceptive protection 4 . Centrally locate squamous cell carcinoma lung 5 . Proteinuria > 1+ dipstick test 6 . History gastrointestinal malabsorption Surgery involve intestinal anastomosis within four week study start . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
